reversed.travel_meaning: Weakness or abandonment—reach out for support.
reversed.travel_style: Supported explorer, community-connected traveler, help-accepting adventurer

upright.travel_meaning: Completion, fulfillment, and successful journey cycles.
upright.travel_style: Trip completion, journey closure, cycle ending celebrations

reversed.travel_meaning: Incomplete cycle or burdensome load—let go and renew.
reversed.travel_style: Renewal-seeking explorer, burden-releasing traveler, fresh-start seeker
